title: Living with disaster: stories and experiences from disasters
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Prevention and control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural disasters
abstract: Stories from the 'Black Saturday' bushfires and the Newcastle floods.
description: 'Living with disaster' is a major project by ACMI in collaboration with the Attorney General’s Department through its Emergency Management division and the CFA, in order to capture stories of young people who have survived natural disasters.
